title: Crafting glitch
body: I opened a chest and my client crashed when I opened it and the chest is gone and I didnt get anything. Please help

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it looks like you received a Blood Moon Icon and 150 Orange Essence.

Let me know if you have any other questions or if you encounter any more client crashes.

Hello, best thing to do is to contact Player Support and they will be able to tell you what you unlocked or not. Give as many details as possible about the day/hour it happened.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
